name: RUSH(Prototype)
description:
this is a prototype project i am working on. I could really help some feedback on this so i am posting this on here. There are 7 levels, and all of them don't have any tutorial or directions yet (sorry lol) . There are a bunch of mechanics in this game like [grappling hook, doublejump, crouch-sliding]. again please just give me some kind of feedback to improve my game(IF YOU HAVE THE TIME OF COURSE). Keep in mind that you WILL rage at the game as you don't or WON'T have any clue what's going on lol. Bye, have a great day, personally I am not having the greatest of days right now.

btw here is my discord (if you need some help or just wanna contact me, personally i am just extremely bored lol): AGENTcrash#7913
